faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I upgrade or downgrade at any time?
faq.a1: Yes! You can upgrade from Free to Pro at any time. If you need to downgrade or cancel, please contact our support team and we'll help you manage your subscription.
faq.q2: What happens if I hit the free plan limit?
faq.a2: The free plan allows you to track up to 3 subscriptions. Once you reach this limit, you'll be prompted to upgrade to Pro for unlimited subscription tracking.
faq.a3: Absolutely! We use Stripe for payment processing, which is trusted by millions of businesses worldwide. We never store your payment information on our servers.
